description:
Works to trees in rear and front gardens subject to Barnsbury No.1 TPO 1968 

 Front garden Chestnut (T22) :Crown lift 5m, light crown thin 20%, remove low horizontal laterals growing over adjacent building lightly reduce by 20% long extended branch over road and deadwood. Lime (T21): Crown thin 35%-40% throughout entire ground and deadwood. Rear garden - Pear (T18) : Crown reduce 20% and crown lift 5m. Tree of Heaven (T20) : Crown lift 5m, Crown thin 20%, clear building to allow 3m clearance from building and deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
